name: Kobi Oshrat
description: '''Kobi Oshrat''' ({{langx|he|קובי אשרת}}; born July 15, 1944) is an Israeli [[Music composer|composer]] and [[Orchestra conductor|conductor]]. He composed and conducted the winning entry at the [[1979 Eurovision Song Contest]] ''[[Hallelujah (Milk and Honey song)|Hallelujah]]'' sung by the vocal ensemble [[Milk and Honey (Israeli group)|Milk and Honey]].
